commits.author: Dawid Weiss
Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew: /** * Creates a field for numeric values with the specified * precisionStep. The instance is not yet initialized with a * numeric value, before indexing a document containing this field, set a * value using the various set???Value() methods. This constructor * creates an indexed, but not stored field. * * @param name * the field name * @param precisionStep * the used precision step */ public NumericField(String name, int precisionStep) { this(name, precisionStep, NumericField.TYPE_UNSTORED); }
